titleStmt.title: Bloud justly reveng'd, or, A True relation of the confessions and behaviour of the two persons hang'd in Fleetstreet, Octob. 22. 1675. And thence removed to hang in chains, on Sandford-hill and Finchly Common. For murthering Sir R.S. : Published for a warning to all rash and unadvised persons. With allowance.

notesStmt.note: Pages 3 and 4 are blank on verso.
Reproduction of original in: British Library.
